metadata.description: Marvel's Most Wanted- the villains-turned-would-be-heroes known as the Thunderbolts- are back! But which side of the law are they on this time? If they're up to their old villainous ways, the Avengers are determined to find out about it- and stop them before they get started! But which side is Hawkeye on?
metadata.name: Avengers/Thunderbolts
